product_name: Royal Robbins Kick Back Crossover Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Next time you pack your bags and prepare to jet away somewhere fun, be sure to include the women's Kick Back Crossover Top from Royal Robbins. 100% cotton shirt is soft, breathable and easy care. Rib-knit fabric provides more stretch than plain knits and ensures great freedom of movement. Offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Royal Robbins Kick Back Crossover Top for women features a V-neck, crossover yoke and long sleeves.
short_description: Next time you pack your bags and prepare to jet away somewhere fun, be sure to include the women's Kick Back Crossover Top from Royal Robbins.
